q: Fortunately the museum also has a huge gift shop, and the looters found it first. "Those people were idiots," Zahi Hawass , head of Egypt's department of antiquities, told Time. They looted the museum shop. Thank God they thought that the museum shop was the museum. Others dispute the level of damage done, however. had finished her studies, Aids had taken the life of her father. Travelling back to take care of him, Liz Murray says she took some comfort in knowing that her father had died a sober man. When someone gets sober, it's almost like meeting them for the first time. "Just before he passed away, he wrote me this card. "He wrote in the card, "Lizzy, I left my dreams behind a long time ago. But I know now they're safe with you. Now we're a family again.' funding for abortion providers. With Planned Parenthood the biggest recipient of those funds, Mike Pence said Americans should be "shocked" that the organization "has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking." The recent release of an undercover video exposing duplicity and potential criminality by an employee of Planned Parenthood is an outrage, Mike Pence said.
